title: Rito? Why no 155k Essence?
body: Riot, you said my current balance is 75893 but my total balance is 155893 so why do i not have 155k in the top corner????

replies.body: Did you complete the mission and open the BE orbs you got from it?
It's a mission. Check your mission log. It'll be in your loot as essence capsules after you complete it.
